name: hungry frog (itch) (char, bonyaaa)
description:
Hi, my name is Charlotte, my best friend Chloe and I made this game in 3 days for Mini-Jam 106: Frogs. This is also the first game we ever coded so while the game isn't the best we are both really proud. We are just 2 trans girls making videogames.

P.S. Trans pride :)
